name: Nadhi
overview:
Nadhi equips the construction industry with technology and consulting solutions for project management, monitoring and control.

The construction industry loses billions of dollars annually due to information latency and poor interoperability between systems. Nadhi’s flagship nPulse solution enables users to easily manage and monitor project schedules. It makes sure that vital information about project health including

  • project progress
  • reduction in productivity
  • unavailability of material
  • risks

reaches decision makers at the right level via emails, SMS alerts, CXO dashboards and detailed reports.

This real-time information enables informed decision-making and makes early course corrections possible, resulting in reduced wastage of time, materials, and resources (people, plant and machinery etc.) that lead to significant cost savings.

Nadhi’s Lean Construction practice works closely with contractors to help them improve their planning process and also helps them identify and eliminate areas of waste.
